member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.Xunit.Tasks.DynamicElementXunitTaskBase.UncollapsedParentTaskId
member.summary: The ID of the parent task. Unreliable!
member.remarks:
Required in order to find the parent element of a newly created task. Should really only be set when sending from the runner to the provider, not when creating tasks in . The problem is that the tasks returned from are collapsed based on equality, and each task would have a different parent task ID. Also, we'll end up with tasks in the runner that have a parent task ID that's doesn't match any of the tasks it knows about.
So, just like , this property should not be included in the equality comparers.
